text: Vito Joseph LoGrasso (born June 18, 1964 in Brooklyn) is an American professional wrestler. He is known under the ring names Big Vito and just Vito. He is best known for his time in World Championship Wrestling (WCW) and World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). He also spent a short time in Extreme Championship Wrestling (ECW) and Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA). On September 2013, he opened a wrestling school in Clearwater, Florida. ==Championships== *Atomic Championship Wrestling **ACW Tristate Championship (one time) *American Championship Pro Wrestling **ACPW Heavyweight Championship (one time, current) *Big Time Wrestling **BTW Heavyweight Championship (one time) *Deep South Wrestling **Deep South Heavyweight Championship (one time) *European Wrestling Promotion **Ironman Hardcore Knockout Tournament (2002) *Golden Cine Professional Wrestling **Pro Wrestling Heavyweight Championship of Nepal (one time) *International Wrestling Association **IWA Intercontinental Heavyweight Championship (one time) *Midwest Championship Wrestling Alliance **MCWA Tag Team Championship (one time) (with Helmut Hessler) *United States Extreme Wrestling **UXW United States Championship (one time) *World Championship Wrestling **WCW Hardcore Championship (two times) (won jointly with Johnny the Bull) **WCW World Tag Team Championship (two times) (with Johnny the Bull) ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from New York City Category:Total Nonstop Action Wrestling alumni
title: Vito LoGrasso
